notes: The LLM reported 'safe' with 0 findings, completely missing the critical price oracle manipulation vulnerability. The contract has the exact same vulnerable pattern as the Cream Finance exploit: it uses spot prices from an oracle that likely derives from AMM pools (line 31-32, 47-49, 62-63), has no manipulation resistance, no TWAP, no flash loan detection, and the _0xae3550 (borrow) and _0x0cce35 (collateral calculation) functions are vulnerable to the same attack vector. The LLM failed to identify any issues.
